name: Dead of Winter
description:
Dead of Winter is a survival exploration game with no language. You play as a lonely drifter trying to uncover the mystery of the island by making your way to the mountain. Along your journey you will find wall paintings which allow you to harness the mysterious power of the blue flame to get past obstacles. 

Developed as part of my Final Year Project at the University of Plymouth Game Arts & Design Course. 

Check out my other work on: 

https://www.artstation.com/fontaiiiiine
